title: lol client has stopped responding and has closed
body:
The actual error in event viewer is 
The program LolClient.exe version 0.0.0.0 stopped interacting with Windows and was closed. To see if more information about the problem is available, check the problem history in the Security and Maintenance control panel.
I've run a check in security and maintenance to see if my computer can fix this and it can't. If riot has any solutions they would be greatly appreciated. This happens to me mostly when I hit accept on a match, this leads to me getting timed bans for "dodging." 
Occurrence: Twice today but usually once every day or two.
Computer:
MSI GE62 6QF Apache pro

replies.body:
If I understand correctly, your client is crashing when accepting a match.  What error message is the client giving you?  Are you on the updated client?  If so, what happens if you try the legacy:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know!

The client itself gives me no error message other than when I hover the tab at the bottom in parentheses it says (client is not responding). I currently am on the legacy client so I will update to the beta client and see if that helps the situation as well as do a scan for corrupted files. Thanks for your assistance.
